sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:pricing: $350 USD for preparation of 100 µL virus + $30 USD for plasmid.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Expresses a soma-targeted GtACR1 in Cre-expressing neurons.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV_hSyn1-SIO-stGtACR1-FusionRed was a gift from Ofer Yizhar (Addgene plasmid # 105678 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:105678 ; RRID:Addgene_105678) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 105678) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 105678-AAV5)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:shipment: Viral particles are shipped frozen on dry ice. Plasmid DNA (≥ 200ng) will also be included in the shipment.
